extensionDescription.message: A simple browser extension for managing your productivity.

commandsStartTomato.description: Manifest.json command to start a timer.

commandsStartShortBreak.description: Manifest.json command to start a short break timer.

commandsStartLongBreak.description: Manifest.json command to start a long break timer.

commandsResetTimer.description: Manifest.json command to reset the timer.
